alert.note: Alert for Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN COLUMBIA AND EAST CENTRAL SUWANNEE COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 842 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbia, or 8 miles south of Lake City, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Columbia, Wellborn, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield, Suwannee Valley, and Mcalpin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
